articles.author: Michael Wayland
articles.title: Toyota redesigns America's top-selling RAV4 SUV to exclusively be a hybrid - CNBC
articles.description: Toyota Motor will offer the 2026 RAV4 only as a hybrid or plug-in hybrid, eliminating a traditional gas engine in the vehicle.
articles.content:
PLANO, Texas The top-selling SUV in the United States will exclusively be offered as a hybrid model as part of a redesign of the RAV4 lineup, Toyota Motor announced Tuesday night.
The world's larges… [+5391 chars]

articles.title: Rubio defends Trump's foreign policy as Democrats press him on Gaza aid and white South Africans - AP News
